name: dminhk-plugins
description: A curated directory of high-quality plugins for Claude Code

plugins.name: aws-knowledge-mcp-server
plugins.description: Access up-to-date AWS documentation, code samples, API references, and regional availability data

plugins.name: aws-diagram-mcp-server
plugins.description: Create AWS architecture diagrams, sequence diagrams, flow charts, and class diagrams using Python diagrams DSL

plugins.name: aws-pricing-mcp-server
plugins.description: Get real-time AWS pricing data, cost analysis, and optimization recommendations using natural language queries

plugins.name: aws-api-mcp-server
plugins.description: Execute and suggest AWS CLI commands with validation, security controls, and hallucination protection

plugins.name: amazon-bedrock-agentcore-mcp-server
plugins.description: Search and access Amazon Bedrock AgentCore documentation, APIs, tutorials, and best practices

plugins.name: terraform-mcp-server
plugins.description: Terraform development on AWS with best practices, security scanning via Checkov, and AWS provider documentation

plugins.name: cdk-mcp-server
plugins.description: AWS CDK best practices, AWS Solutions Constructs, GenAI CDK patterns, and CDK Nag security validation

plugins.name: tavily-mcp-server
plugins.description: Real-time web search and intelligent content extraction powered by Tavily
